Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Katie Hirst
Reviews.Content: Very excited about this camera. It was every thing I thought it would be and more. This was a great up grade for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Vivitar 67mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case + <9> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> T Mount for Canon EOS + <14> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens with EF-S 55-250mm IS & 500mm Telephoto Lenses + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Monopod Kit
